title: Alunguraen Kulunguraen Lyrics Chandi Veeran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Chandi Veeran Alunguraen Kulunguraen Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Prasanna Rao, Namitha
Music: S.N. Arunagiri

Alunguraen Kulunguraen
Oru aasai nenjuley
Adhunguraen Idhunguraen
Onnum pesum thonaley
Nadaya nadanthen
Kedaya kendanthen
Minnungura Sinungura
Thalumbonnu thalumbora

Alunguraen Kulunguraen
Oru aasai nenjuley
Adhunguraen Idhunguraen
Onnum pesum thonaley

Panchu nee Panchula
Padhungi varum noolu naan
Anju nee Anjula
Adangi varum naalu naan
Pandhi nee Pandhala
Thaangukira kaalu naan
Pandhu nee pandhula
Nerambi nirkum kaathu naan
Aathaadi enna aathunu aathuney
Kaathaagi mela thoothunu mella thootuna
Kaadhala meetuney
Kadavula kaatuney

Alunguraen Kulunguraen
Oru aasai nenjuley
Adhunguraen Idhunguraen
Onnum pesum thonaley
Nadaya nadanthen
Kedaya kendanthen
Minnungura Sinungura
Thalumbonnu thalumbora

Alunguraen Kulunguraen
Oru aasai nenjuley
Adhunguraen Idhunguraen
Onnum pesum thonaley

Konala maanala irundha manam nerula
kaaludhan pogudhey kaadhal enum oorula
Naadala naadala rasichu manam aadala
Tholanchathu therinjum naan
Innum yen thedala
Kannellam un kaatchi dhaan
Kaatchi dhaan
Kaadhellam un petchu dhaan
Petchu dhaan
Kaadhala meetuney
Kadavula kaatuney

Alunguraen Kulunguraen
Oru aasai nenjuley
Adhunguraen Idhunguraen
Onnum pesum thonaley
Nadaya nadanthen
Kedaya kendanthen
Minnungura Sinungura
Thalumbonnu thalumbora
